TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HeaderedItemsControl extends System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl

summary.span: 表示包含多個項目且有標頭的控制項。

span.span: Represents a control that contains multiple items and has a header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個類別來建立包含控制項的標題 （或標題） 和多個項目。Use this class to create a control that contains a heading (or title) and multiple items. 屬性可以是任何類型。The property can be any type. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 隨附三個繼承的控制項: ships three controls that inherit from : - - - A有限的預設樣式。A has a limited default style. 若要建立自訂外觀，以建立新。To create a with a custom appearance, create a new . 設定屬性，以指定的標籤。Set the property to specify the label of the . 可以是物件的任何類型。 can be any type of object. 設定屬性自訂標頭。Set the property to a to customize the header. 如需資料範本的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料範本化概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information about data templates, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下列範例會建立。The following example creates a . 控制項包含單一，標示`TreeViewItem 1`，且具有下列項目：The control contains a single , which is labeled `TreeViewItem 1`, and has the following items: - 字串。A string. - 物件。A object. - A物件，其中包含中其。A object that contains a in its . - A物件，其屬性設定為，其中包含兩個物件。A object whose property is set to a that contains two objects. > [!NOTE] > 此範例會明確地建立物件，最後兩個項目，因為和繼承自類別。The example explicitly creates objects for the last two items because and inherit from the class. 預設樣式設定屬性。The default style for the sets the property. 子物件繼承屬性值明確建立，通常是所要的行為。The child objects inherit the property value from the explicitly created , which is typically the desired behavior. [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#17)] 下列範例會建立如。The following example creates a for a . [!code-xaml[HeaderedItemsControl#HeaderedItemsControl_Style](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedItemsControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headereditemscontrol_style)] [!code-xaml[HeaderedItemsControl#HeaderedItemsControl](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedItemsControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headereditemscontrol)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性是`null`，這個屬性會傳回`false`。If the property is `null`, this property returns `false`. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用這個屬性來判斷控制項是否具有標頭。The following example shows how to use this property to determine whether the control has a header. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要自訂標題，將此屬性設定為。To customize the heading of the , set this property to a . 如需有關資料範本的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料範本化概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information on data templates, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 取得或設定物件，這個物件可提供用來顯示每個項目標頭之範本的自訂選擇邏輯。

span.span: Gets or sets the object that provides custom selection logic for a template used to display the header of each item.
A data template selector.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常您會建立有一個以上相同類型的物件，而且您想要提供您自己選擇的邏輯套用根據每個資料物件的屬性。Typically, you create a when you have more than one for the same type of objects and you want to supply your own logic to choose a to apply based on the properties of each data object. 請注意，如果您有不同的物件類型與您可以設定屬性。Note that if you have objects of different types you can set the property on the . 如果您這麼做，則不需要建立。If you do that, then there is no need to create a . 此外，如果您有物件類型相同，但具有不同的屬性時，您也可以考慮使用或資料轉換。Furthermore, if you have objects of the same type but with different properties, you can also consider using a or a data converter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [資料範本化概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). 若要建立範本選擇器，請建立繼承自類別並覆寫方法。To create a template selector, create a class that inherits from and override the method. 您的類別定義之後，您可以指派給您的項目範本選取器屬性的類別的執行個體。After your class is defined, you can assign an instance of the class to the template selector property of your element. 如果兩個和屬性設定，則會忽略範本選取器屬性。If both the and the properties are set, the template selector property is ignored. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回字串，包含標頭屬性中的項目數的相關資訊屬性。This method returns a string that contains information about the header property and the number of items in the property.
